item.description:
Holidays can be full of obligations and stress. Materialism and hectic schedules can take a toll on the spirit of the season. How about having it different this year? How might you follow your heart in attending holiday events that enhance your well being and that of those you care about? Can you allow yourself to open to new ways of giving and receiving by keeping the focus on real, simple exchanges and kind, charitable acts?
Join us to learn to keep your balance and tune in to the peaceful joy of this Season of Light.

There will be a fee of $25 for this seminar. All profit will benefit the Center of Light, A spiritual center dedicated to peace and consciousness.
item.how_to_find_us: The center is on the Framingham commom. Park in the driveway on the side
item.name: Planting the seeds of Love for the Holidays
